properties.entry: INSERT INTO RENTAL(REN_NO, DEV_NO, CUST_NO, REN_DATE, STATUS) VALUES( SEQ_RENNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, '대여중' )
UPDATE RENTAL SET STATUS = '반납완료' WHERE CUST_NO = ? AND DEV_NO = ? AND STATUS = '대여중'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RENTAL WHERE DEV_NO = ? AND STATUS = '대여중'
SELECT D.DEV_NO, D.CATEGORY, D.DEV_NAME, D.PRICE, D.ARRIVAL_DATE FROM RENTAL R JOIN DEVICE D ON D.DEV_NO = R.DEV_NO WHERE R.CUST_NO = ? AND R.STATUS = '대여중'
